Formation Controller

This is the Implementation of the formation controller. It is implemented as Angle-Distance controller and as a kartesian tracking controller. An example of its configuration is given within the config directory with the controller.yaml file

Leader and Follower

Leader controller are master nodes (see master.h) while the follower robots are controlled by the slave node (see slave.h).


multi_robot_controller
